entry.title: WIND WARNING , La Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING ENDED, La Prairie

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -8.3°C

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -10.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
